and Yumeno Kishimoto's graduation performance at the Nippon Budokan.

I'm Natsume Nakayama from Ocha-no-Oma, and this time I'd like to show you my usual eye makeup plus eye makeup for live performances.
I'd like to start with the eye makeup and blush.
I'm going to start with the eye makeup that I usually do. I'm using this one, the lightest color that's close to my skin tone.
I'm going to take a brush and blend it with a tissue and then apply it to the inner corner of the eye. The key is to apply it so that the outer corner of the eye is a little bit darker.

I'm going to paint from the edge of the eye to the outer edge of the black eye.
This makes the face look clearer.
